p: The cultivation of the archaeon Natrialba sp. M6 was carried out according to our abovementioned optimized conditions by incubation at 45 °C with shaking at 200 rpm for 10 days and with inoculum aged 11 days. Pigments were then extracted by liquid extraction using acetone and methanol. It was found that 3.15 g of biomass cells gave approximately 9.8 mg of pigment after extraction and drying.
